upgrades.changelog:
**Please note: This update will swap the outputs for devices already installed on the motor. To avoid issues with existing commands or automation, we recommend using Parameter 5: Swap Output to Swapped.**
- fixed switch input and output orientation
- fixed remote commands compatibility
- other minor improvements
